Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Lankshire Parkway past the Circle-Bar Slaughterhouse.
Room.LongDescription: There is a large cattle ranch off to the east, off of Appleton Road. When they reach a certain age, they are herded off to the Slaughter- house, located to the east of this road. To the north, you can see the Allisk Circle, where Lankshire Parkway, Hillcrest Drive and Appleton Road intersect.
